title: Student of dental medicine
introText: and I am here with an initiative to help people achieve healthy and beautiful smiles. My aspiration is to provide high-quality care, combining the latest knowledge from my studies with an individual approach to each patient. I believe smile health is key to self-esteem and overall well-being.
introText2: Don't hesitate to contact me and discuss how I can help with your dental health. Each procedure is performed with attention to detail and under the strict supervision of experienced specialists. I am waiting for you with a smile!
aboutText: Martin Ruskov, a student of dentistry at Plovdiv Medical University, offers professional dental services at symbolic and affordable prices. With accumulated practice and a constant desire to keep up with the latest discoveries and technologies, he skilfully combines his knowledge of medicine with interests in other scientific disciplines. This multidisciplinary approach allows him to implement innovative solutions in patient care.
aboutText2: In addition to focusing on modern technology and scientific advances, Martin relies on his ability to predispose patients and create a relaxed atmosphere. Procedures are stress-free, the attention to detail and the pursuit of perfection ensure high-quality care.
aboutText3: The combination of professionalism, dedication and innovative approaches makes Martin an outstanding choice for anyone looking for reliable and affordable dental care.
servicesSubscript: All manipulations are performed under the strict supervision of an experienced specialist from the Faculty of Dental Medicine at the Medical University of Plovdiv, in order to guarantee the safety and quality of the procedures.
contactsSuperscript: You can contact me on the phone number, email or private message on WhatsApp, Viber, Messenger and Instagram. I accept patients at the Faculty of Dental Medicine at the Medical University of Plovdiv
